thread.title: BRIEF-PREIT Reports Year-To-Date Comparable Store Sales Up 8.2 Pct Through Feb

title: BRIEF-PREIT Reports Year-To-Date Comparable Store Sales Up 8.2 Pct Through Feb

organizations.name: feb reuters staff    pennsylvania real estate investment trust

text:
40 AM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-PREIT Reports Year-To-Date Comparable Store Sales Up 8.2 Pct Through Feb Reuters Staff 
  Pennsylvania Real Estate Investment Trust: 
* PREIT - YEAR-TO-DATE COMPARABLE STORE SALES IN ITS PORTFOLIO WERE UP 8.2% THROUGH FEBRUARY 
* PREIT - AS A RESULT OF PREITâ€™S DISPOSITION, STRATEGY, IT REDUCED ITS BON-TON EXPOSURE FROM 10 IN 2012 TO 2 TODAY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
